description: A small hairline crack is visible on the top surface of the front right leg, near the front.
evidence: Visible in close-up photograph of the front-right leg/seat joint.

description: Noticeable scuffing and discoloration along the front edge of the seat.
evidence: Clearly visible in the close-up image of the seat's front corner.

description: A cluster of small, dark stains or impressions on the top surface of the seat.
evidence: Visible in a top-down close-up of the seat surface.

description: A long, light-colored scratch on the seat's top surface toward the left side.
evidence: Visible in a photograph showing the left side of the seat.

description: A small circular dent on the front face of the backrest near the top right corner.
evidence: Visible in a close-up photograph of the backrest and back-right leg joint.

description: Multiple horizontal scuff marks are visible on the front face of the front left leg.
evidence: Visible in a close-up photograph of a leg, identified as the front left.
